title: Lenguage change
body: Hello everyone, i have a question for anybody to answer if posible cause it will help me a lot. I'm constantly changin servers between LAN and NA so I constantly change the lenguage of my LoL in the files but a couple of patches back even if you would change the lenguage in the "locale" file the game would not change the lenguage of it, i personaly preffer my game to be in English. I found a way to make it easyer to change after that happended by adding some stuff in an especific file in the 4.11 update or something like that i don't really remember. Now that we got the new client i can't really find the file to change the lenguage in case I change servers. Can anybody help me with that, I would really apreciate it.

replies.body: Soo im gonna have to play in the old client, cause i really like the Beta Client but i really don't like the spanish version of everthing, I can still understand it but i just don't like it cince i have played the game in english since i started playing. I want to know if there is abtually a way to change that, if you guys can implement that lenguage change from the very start on the client it would be awesome

Manually changing your language does not work with the Beta Client, as it can cause some *huge issues*.

Let me know if you have any questions.
will there be a way to do that when the client isn't beta anymore?

To be able to manually change your client's language to one that *isn't supported* on your region? Hard to say, since I don't work on the team that develops the new client. I'd say it's very unlikely, but again, I'm not sure what that team has planned for languages specifically.

yeah... I bounce between LAN and NA as well and having to patch twice is a nuissance... not to mention that I also speak Japanese and at times I like my client and voices to be in japanese... I think that giving us the options to use any language we want would be nice or at least give us the option to patch both languages at once :S I know you don't work on this but if you could pass the word around we'd appreciate it!
